kv12.8:5.1: Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti?
kv12.8:5.3: Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya … pe …
kv12.8:5.9: duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeyya … pe …
kv12.8:6.1: Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti?
kv12.8:7.3: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo satthari sagāravo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.8:7.11: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sikkhāya sagāravo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.8:8.3: Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo buddhathūpe ohadeyya omutteyya niṭṭhubheyya buddhathūpe apabyāmato kareyyāti?
kv12.8:9.1: Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti?
kv12.8:9.5: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti.
